record.title: Complete Genome Sequence of Terriglobus albidus Strain ORNL, an Acidobacterium Isolated from the Populus deltoides Rhizosphere
record.description: This Narrative was used for a complete genome sequence of a new strain of Terriglobus albidus. It is a heterotrophic bacterium associated with the rhizophere of the eastern cottonwood tree (Populus deltoides).

authors.author: Podar, Mircea [Oak Ridge National Lab. (ORNL), Oak Ridge, TN (United States)]

research_orgs.research_org: Oak Ridge National Lab. (ORNL), Oak Ridge, TN (United States)
